projectPurpose: To provide a modern, enhanced command-line utility for viewing file contents, serving as a feature-rich alternative to the standard 'cat' command.
mainFeatures: Show line numbers and grid borders

alternatives.name: less
mainFeatures: View file contents page by page (paging)

alternatives.name: more
mainFeatures: View file contents page by page

marketPositioning: bat positions itself as a modern, user-friendly, and feature-rich replacement for the standard 'cat' utility. It integrates capabilities typically found in separate tools (like syntax highlighters and pagers), such as automatic syntax highlighting, Git integration, and automatic paging, into a single command. This makes it a highly effective tool for developers and power users who frequently view code and text files in the terminal, offering a significantly enhanced viewing experience compared to the basic 'cat' or piping to 'less' and a highlighter.
